A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Arguably the best of the franchise. The story was the smoothest\, had tons of humor to keep us interested in a seemingly hopeless journey\, and one of the biggest shocks in cinema history\, yes the kylo ren vs rey scene.

It was full of twists and turns and you never quite knew what was going to happen. Yes luke milked a thing\, yes there was a fairly predictable death. Get over yourselves.

It was the smoothest\, funnest installment to the franchise. Who was the editing team behind this? They need a medal!
